official_title: Decision Aid for Management of Thyroid Nodules and Early Thyroid Cancer
inclusion_criteria:
* Histology showing indeterminate or malignant thyroid pathology (Bethesda III-VI)
* Thyroid nodule size less or equal to 2cm
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* History of thyroid surgery
* History of thyroid cancer
